description-area.first: A simple yet beautiful music player app

what-info.title: What information we collect
what-info.first: We collect information that help us improve the app's stability, such as errors and crashes.
what-info.second: We also collect the phone model, country and the Android version.

how-info.title: How we use information we collect
how-info.first: We collect information to help mitigate crashes and errors so that the user experience is in line with our goals.

data-collection.title: Opt-out of data collection
data-collection.first: You can opt-out of data collection by disabling this option in the app's settings.
